des: "My mom and I had this at the Magic KingdomÂ® in DisneyÂ® and it is to die for! Excellent on a hot day as a smoothie and even better when frozen as a sorbet."
ins: Blend pineapple, sugar, lemon juice, and lime juice together in a blender until mostly smooth; freeze until slushy consistency, 1 to 2 hours. Stir cream into pineapple mixture until evenly incorporated.
